meanings.definition: A small store selling fashionable clothes or accessories.
meanings.sent1: I love shopping at boutiques for unique outfits.
meanings.sent2: The boutiques in the city center always have the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: The boutique down the street had a sale, so I bought a new dress.
meanings.sent4: Her boutique of scarves and hats was a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The boutique's window display was so inviting, I had to go inside.

meanings.definition: A small business offering specialized products or services.
meanings.sent1: The boutique of handmade soaps was a hit at the craft fair.
meanings.sent2: Local boutiques often provide personalized customer service.
meanings.sent3: I started a boutique selling homemade candles as a side hustle.
meanings.sent4: His boutique of vintage records was a treasure trove for music lovers.
meanings.sent5: The boutique's focus on organic skincare products set it apart from big retailers.
